messages.title: Real change with the Liberal Democrats
messages.content: After thirteen years, we know what life is like with Gordon Brown and Labour.
In many parts of Britain, it's a choice between the Lib Dems and Labour.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving you the power to sack corrupt MPs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will clean up Westminster and put more police on our streets to make Britain safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stopping MPs being bought by millionaire and billionaire donors
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will clean up Westminster and put more police on our streets to make Britain safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making politicians work for the people again
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will clean up Westminster and put more police on our streets to make Britain safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: 3000 extra police will help catch more criminals
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will clean up Westminster and put more police on our streets to make Britain safer.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain, the choice is between Labour and the Lib Dems.

issues.governance: The Lib Dems will clean up Westminster.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet makes a tactical voting appeal based on the binary choice in many parts of Britain between Liberal Democrats and Labour.
